Package com.viaoa.web.html.oa

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OATableColumnInterface
    Used by Table column components (ex: OAInputText), so that table can render each table cell.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Hub2TreeNode
    Used by OATreeNodeData for each node in the tree that uses a Hub.
    OAAccordionBar  
    OAAccordionPanel
    Bootstrap Accordion that uses data-bs-* to prewire JS See also OAAccordionBar.
    OAButtonGroup  
    OACardPanel
    This uses BS classes "collapse" and "show", and assumes initial html is using them.
    OACheckBoxLabel  
    OAComboBox
    HtmlSelect to work with OAModel.
    OAConsole  
    OADialog  
    OAHtmlButton
    HtmlButton to work with OAModel.
    OAHtmlElement<F extends com.viaoa.object.OAObject>
    Used to set the inner html for any html element.
    OAHtmlSelect
    HtmlSelect to work with OAModel.
    OAHtmlTextArea
    Binds HtmlTextArea to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputButton
    InputButton that works with OAModel.
    OAInputCheckBox
    Binds Input CheckBox to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputColor  
    OAInputDate
    Binds InputDate to a Hub + propertyName
    OAInputDateTime
    Binds InputDateTime to a Hub + propertyName Note: only works with: input type="datetime-local", and not type="datetime"
    OAInputFile  
    OAInputImage
    InputButton that works with OAModel.
    OAInputNumber
    Binds Input Number to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputPassword
    Binds Input Password to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputRadio
    Binds Input Radio to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputRange
    Binds InputText to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputSubmit
    InputSubmit that works with OAModel.
    OAInputText
    Binds InputText to an Hub + propertyName
    OAInputTime
    Binds InputTime to a Hub + propertyName
    OALabel  
    OAList
    HtmlSelect to work with OAModel.
    OAPanel  
    OAResizePanel  
    OASplitButton  
    OASplitPanel
    Create a split panel from an existing panel.
    OASummernoteTextArea
    Binds Summernote textarea to an Hub + propertyName
    OATable
    Creates a table listing.
    OATable.Change  
    OATable.OATableColumn  
    OATableComboBox  
    OATabPanel  
    OAToolbarOptions
    Types of UI components to add to toolbar.
    OATree  
    OATree.TreeNodeDataChange
    Server side events that affect the client.
    OATreeComboBox  
    OATreeNode  
    OATreeNodeData
    Used by OATree Model and Hub2TreeNode to maintain the data and listeners for the OATreeNodes.
    OATreeTitleNode  
    OATypeAheadInputText
    InputText that is used for a type ahead search.
    OAVisibleObserverElement
    Creates a js visible listener on the client.
